query: 'SELECT
    P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
     SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    DA.TOWER,
    DA.[LEVEL],
    DA.FLAT,
    'Dry Area' as Sclicer,
     DA.ACTIVITY_ID,
    CASE 
        WHEN DA.VALUE IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE DA.VALUE
    END AS VALUE,
    DA.TYPE_OF_WORK,
    DA.CATEGORY,
     DA.UPLOAD_DATE
FROM(
     SELECT
            DR.UPLOAD_TIME AS UPLOAD_DATE,
            DR.PROJECT_ID,
            DR.TOWER,
            DR.[LEVEL],
            DR.FLAT,
            COLUMN_NAME.*,
            DM.ACTIVITY_ID,
            DM.SBU_ID,
            DM.CATEGORY,
            DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY  PROJECT_ID ORDER BY  UPLOAD_TIME DESC ) AS DRANK
     FROM [STG].[O_PLN_DRYAREA_RAW_STG] DR
     CROSS APPLY(
                      SELECT  [HSE_CLEARANCE_FOR_DESHUTTERING],'HSE CLEARANCE FOR DESHUTTERING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_RISER_WORKS],'MEP RISER WORKS'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [LPG_PIPE],'LPG PIPE'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [BLOCKWORK_LAYOUT_MARKING],'BLOCKWORK LAYOUT MARKING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [BLOCKWORK_FIRST_LAYER],'BLOCKWORK FIRST LAYER'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [BLOCKWORK_WITH_1MTR_MARKING],'BLOCKWORK WITH 1MTR MARKING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [GI_LINTEL],'GI LINTEL'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [RCC_LINTEL_STIFFENER] ,'RCC LINTEL / STIFFENER'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [ABOVE_LINTEL_BLOCK_WORK],'ABOVE LINTEL BLOCK WORK'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [HEAD_RESTRAINTS_INSTALLATION],'HEAD RESTRAINTS INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [FIRE_SEALANT_WORKS_AND_PU_FOAM_WORKS],'FIRE SEALANT WORKS & PU FOAM WORKS'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_MARKING_FOR_HL_BUILDERS_WORK],'MEP MARKING FOR HL BUILDERS WORK'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [BLOCKWORK_CUTTING_FOR_MEP_SERVICES] ,'BLOCKWORK CUTTING FOR MEP SERVICES'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_WALL_MARKING_FOR_CUTTING_AND_CHASING],'MEP WALL MARKING FOR CUTTING & CHASING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [BULL_MARKING_FOR_PLASTER],'BULL MARKING FOR PLASTER'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [SUB_FRAME],'SUB FRAME'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [CORNER_BEAD_FIXING],'CORNER BEAD FIXING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [CUTTING_AND_CHASING],'CUTTING & CHASING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_PLASTERING_CLEARANCE_BOX_FIXING_AND_PIPE_SETTING], 'MEP PLASTERING CLEARANCE (BOX FIXING & PIPE SETTING)'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [ONU_DB_AND_ALL_MEP_WORKS_INSTALLATION],'ONU, DB & ALL MEP WORKS INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [ONU_DB_AND_ALL_MEP_WORKS_PACKING],'ONU, DB & ALL MEP WORKS PACKING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [DRY_AREA_PLASTER],'DRY AREA PLASTER'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [PLASTERING_CLEARANCE_WITH_1_METER_MARKING], 'PLASTERING CLEARANCE WITH 1 METER MARKING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [CENTER_LINE_MARKING_FOR_FACADE_INSTALLATION], 'CENTER LINE MARKING FOR FACADE INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [UCW_STARTER_GUTTER],'UCW-STARTER GUTTER'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [UCW_BRACKETS],'UCW-BRACKETS'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [UCW_PANELS],'UCW-PANELS'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [UCW_ALIGNMENT],'UCW-ALIGNMENT'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [DRY_AREA_TILE_MARKING],'DRY AREA TILE MARKING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [DRY_AREA_BORE_PACKING],'DRY AREA BORE PACKING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [DRY_AREA_SCREED],'DRY AREA SCREED'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [SCREED_CURING],'SCREED CURING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [PRIMER_STUCCO_BANDING],'PRIMER,STUCCO BANDING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [BULK_HEAD],'BULK HEAD'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_H_L_WIRING],'MEP H/L WIRING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_H_L_FRAMING_CLEARANCE],'MEP H/L FRAMING CLEARANCE'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [FIRE_SEALANT_WORKS_AROUND_DUCTS],'FIRE SEALANT WORKS AROUND DUCTS'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [DRY_AREA_FC_FRAMING],'DRY AREA FC FRAMING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [WARDROBE_NIB_WALL],'WARDROBE NIB WALL'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_H_L_BOARDING_CLEARANCE],'MEP H/L BOARDING CLEARANCE'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [FC_BOARDING_WITH_JOINT_TAPING],'FC BOARDING WITH JOINT TAPING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [PRIMER_CEILING],'PRIMER CEILING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [STUCCO_1ST_COAT_CEILING],'STUCCO 1ST COAT CEILING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [STUCCO_2ND_COAT_CEILING],'STUCCO 2ND COAT CEILING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [FIRST_COAT_PAINT_CEILING],'FIRST COAT PAINT CEILING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [MAIN_DOOR_THRESHOLD],'MAIN DOOR THRESHOLD'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [DRY_AREA_FLOOR_TILING],'DRY AREA FLOOR TILING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [DRY_AREA_SKIRTING],'DRY AREA SKIRTING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [POP_ABOVE_SKIRTING],'POP ABOVE SKIRTING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [HINGE_DOOR_BOX_INSTALLATION],'HINGE DOOR BOX INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [SCREED_NEAR_HINGE_DOOR],'SCREED NEAR HINGE DOOR'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [HINGE_DOOR_FRAME_INSTALLATION],'HINGE DOOR FRAME INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [CURTAIN_WALL_BOX_SECTION],'CURTAIN WALL BOX SECTION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [CURTAIN_WALL_FRAME_INSTALLATION],'CURTAIN WALL FRAME INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [CURTAIN_WALL_GLASS_INSTALLATION],'CURTAIN WALL GLASS INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [UCW_GI_SHEET_INSTALLATION_WALL],'UCW-GI SHEET INSTALLATION - WALL'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [UCW_GI_SHEET_INSTALLATION_FLOOR],'UCW-GI SHEET INSTALLATION - FLOOR'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [SCREED_NEAR_CURTAIN_WALL],'SCREED NEAR CURTAIN WALL'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [SLIDING_DOOR_BOX_INSTALLATION],'SLIDING DOOR BOX INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [SLIDING_DOOR_FRAME_INSTALLATION],'SLIDING DOOR FRAME INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [SCREED_NEAR_SLIDING_DOOR],'SCREED NEAR SLIDING DOOR'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [LEFT_OVER_TILE_INSTALLATION],'LEFT OVER TILE INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [LEFT_OVER_SKIRTING],'LEFT OVER SKIRTING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [TILE_GROUTING],'TILE GROUTING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [TILE_SILICONE_WORKS],'TILE SILICONE WORKS'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [CURTAIN_WALL_MULLION],'CURTAIN WALL MULLION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [CURTAIN_WALL_FLASHING_INSTALLATION],'CURTAIN WALL FLASHING INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [CURTAIN_WALL_SILICONE],'CURTAIN WALL SILICONE'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [UCW_FIRESTOP_AND_SILICONE],'UCW-FIRESTOP AND SILICONE'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [UCW_GI_FLASHING],'UCW-GI FLASHING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [HINGE_DOOR_GLASS_INSTALLATION],'HINGE DOOR GLASS INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [HINGE_DOOR_INTERNAL_SILICONE],'HINGE DOOR INTERNAL SILICONE'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [HINGE_DOOR_ALIGNMENT],'HINGE DOOR ALIGNMENT'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [HINGE_DOOR_EXTERNAL_SILICONE],'HINGE DOOR EXTERNAL SILICONE'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [SLIDING_DOOR_GLASS_INSTALLATION],'SLIDING DOOR GLASS INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [SLIDING_DOOR_INTERNAL_SILICONE],'SLIDING DOOR INTERNAL SILICONE'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [SLIDING_DOOR_ALIGNMENT],'SLIDING DOOR ALIGNMENT'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [SLIDING_DOOR_EXTERNAL_SILICONE],'SLIDING DOOR EXTERNAL SILICONE'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [WINDOW_JAMB_CORNER_PELMET_AREA_SHADOW_ANGLE_POP_WORKS],'WINDOW JAMB,CORNER,PELMET AREA, SHADOW ANGLE POP WORKS'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [WALL_STUCCO_1ST_COAT],'WALL STUCCO 1ST COAT'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [WALL_STUCCO_2ND_COAT],'WALL STUCCO 2ND COAT'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [WALL_PAINT_1ST_COAT],'WALL PAINT 1ST COAT'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [DOOR_FRAME_INSTALLATION],'DOOR - FRAME INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [DOOR_ARCHITRAVE_INSTALLATION],'DOOR - ARCHITRAVE INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [DOOR_SHUTTER_INSTALLATION],'DOOR - SHUTTER INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [DOOR_IRONMONGERY_INSTALLATION],'DOOR - IRONMONGERY INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [DOOR_SILICONE_WORKS],'DOOR - SILICONE WORKS'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [CUT_PIECE_SKIRTING_NEAR_DOOR],'CUT PIECE SKIRTING NEAR DOOR'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [GAS_METER_INSTALLATION],'GAS METER INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_KITCHEN_APPLIANCES],'MEP KITCHEN APPLIANCES'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [WARDROBE_CARCASS_INSTALLATION],'WARDROBE CARCASS INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [WARDROBE_SHUTTER_INSTALLATION],'WARDROBE SHUTTER INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [WARDROBE_SILICONE_WORKS],'WARDROBE SILICONE WORKS'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [CUT_PIECE_SKIRTING_NEAR_WARDROBE],'CUT PIECE SKIRTING NEAR WARDROBE'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [AIR_BALANCING_FOR_FCU],'AIR BALANCING FOR FCU'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [FCU_CLOSURE_CLEARANCE],'FCU CLOSURE CLEARANCE'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [VCD_CLOSURE_FCU],'VCD CLOSURE - FCU'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [AIR_BALANCING_FOR_FAHU],'AIR BALANCING FOR FAHU'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [FAHU_CLOSURE_CLEARANCE],'FAHU CLOSURE CLEARANCE'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [VCD_CLOSURE_FAHU],'VCD CLOSURE - FAHU'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [FINAL_FIXTURES_INSTALLATION],'FINAL FIXTURES INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [ACCESS_PANEL_FINAL_COAT_AND_INSTALLATION],'ACCESS PANEL FINAL COAT AND INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [DRY_AREA_FINAL_COAT_PREPARATION],'DRY AREA FINAL COAT PREPARATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [DRY_AREA_FINAL_COAT_PAINT],'DRY AREA FINAL COAT PAINT'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [THERMOSTAT_COVER_INSTALLATION],'THERMOSTAT COVER INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [INTERCOM_COVER_INSTALLATION],'INTERCOM COVER INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [ONU_AND_DB_PANEL_DOOR],'ONU & DB PANEL DOOR'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [SWITCH_SOCKET_COVER_INSTALLATION],'SWITCH SOCKET COVER INSTALLATION'
          ) AS COLUMN_NAME(VALUE,TYPE_OF_WORK)
          INNER JOIN [STG].[O_PLN_DRYAREA_MAP_STG] DM
          ON COLUMN_NAME.TYPE_OF_WORK = DM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
          WHERE VALUE IS NOT NULL ) DA
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] AS LM
     ON          DA.[LEVEL] = LM.[LEVEL]
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          DA.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          DA.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER

',

query: 'SELECT 
    P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER,
    E.TOWER    ,
    E.LEVEL,
    'Electrical Room' as Sclicer,
    E.ACTIVITY_ID    ,
    CASE 
        WHEN E.VALUE IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE E.VALUE
    END AS VALUE,
    E.TYPE_OF_WORK    ,
    E.CATEGORY   ,
    E.UPLOAD_DATE  
FROM (
SELECT ER.UPLOAD_TIME AS UPLOAD_DATE,
ER.PROJECT_ID,
ER.TOWER,
ER.LEVEL,
COLUMN_NAME.*,
EM.ACTIVITY_ID,
EM.SBU_ID,
EM.CATEGORY,
DENSE_RANK () OVER(PARTITION BY  PROJECT_ID ORDER BY  CAST(UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) DESC) DRANK
FROM STG.O_PLN_ELECTRICALROOM_RAW_STG ER
 CROSS APPLY  (
         SELECT BLOCKWORK_LAYOUT,'BLOCKWORK LAYOUT'
UNION ALL SELECT BLOCKWORK,'BLOCKWORK'
UNION ALL SELECT MEP_MARKING_FOR_BUILDERS_WORK,'MEP MARKING FOR BUILDERS WORK'
UNION ALL SELECT CUTTING_AND_CHASING_OF_BLOCKWORK,'CUTTING AND CHASING OF BLOCKWORK'
UNION ALL SELECT MEP_SERVICES_INSTALLATION,'MEP SERVICES INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT WALL_MEP_SERVICES_PACKING,'WALL MEP SERVICES PACKING'
UNION ALL SELECT PLASTER,'PLASTER'
UNION ALL SELECT SCREED,'SCREED'
UNION ALL SELECT WALL_AND_CEILING_PRIMER,'WALL AND CEILING PRIMER'
UNION ALL SELECT CEILING_STUCCO_1ST_AND_2ND_COAT,'CEILING STUCCO (1ST AND 2ND COAT)'
UNION ALL SELECT WALL_STUCCO_1ST_AND_2ND_COAT,'WALL STUCCO (1ST AND 2ND COAT)'
UNION ALL SELECT CEILING_FIRST_COAT_PAINT,'CEILING FIRST COAT PAINT'
UNION ALL SELECT WALL_FIRST_COAT_PAINT,'WALL FIRST COAT PAINT'
UNION ALL SELECT METER_BOARD_FIXING,'METER BOARD FIXING'
UNION ALL SELECT METER_BOARD_PAINTING,'METER BOARD PAINTING'
UNION ALL SELECT INSTALLATION_OF_CABLE_TRAY_AND_TRUNKING,'INSTALLATION OF CABLE TRAY AND TRUNKING'
UNION ALL SELECT INSTALLATION_OF_PANELS,'INSTALLATION OF PANELS'
UNION ALL SELECT CABLE_LAYING_AND_GLANDING_WORKS,'CABLE LAYING AND GLANDING WORKS'
UNION ALL SELECT DRESSING_AND_TERMINATION_OF_SMDB_AND_PANELS,'DRESSING AND TERMINATION OF SMDB AND PANELS'
UNION ALL SELECT BUS_BAR_WITH_TAP_OFF_BOX_COMPLETION,'BUS BAR WITH TAP OFF BOX COMPLETION'
UNION ALL SELECT THRESHOLD,'THRESHOLD'
UNION ALL SELECT FLOOR_TILE,'FLOOR TILE'
UNION ALL SELECT DOOR_FRAME_INSTALLATION,'DOOR FRAME INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT DOOR_ARCHITRAVE_INSTALLATION,'DOOR ARCHITRAVE INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT DOOR_SHUTTER_INSTALLATION,'DOOR SHUTTER INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT DOOR_IRONMONGERY_INSTALLATION,'DOOR IRONMONGERY INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT DOOR_SILICONE,'DOOR SILICONE'
UNION ALL SELECT EPOXY_GRINDING,'EPOXY ERINDING'
UNION ALL SELECT EPOXY_BUG_FILL,'EPOXY BUG FILL'
UNION ALL SELECT EPOXY_PRIMER,'EPOXY PRIMER'
UNION ALL SELECT EPOXY_FIRST_COAT,'EPOXY FIRST COAT'
UNION ALL SELECT EPOXY_FINAL_COAT,'EPOXY FINAL COAT'
UNION ALL SELECT SKIRTING,'SKIRTING'
UNION ALL SELECT POP_WORKS,'POP WORKS'
UNION ALL SELECT ELECTRICAL_ROOM_TOP_BOARDING,'ELECTRICAL ROOM TOP BOARDING'
UNION ALL SELECT FIRE_SEALANT_WORKS,'FIRE SEALANT WORKS'
UNION ALL SELECT ANGLE_FIXING,'ANGLE FIXING'
UNION ALL SELECT SHAFT_BOARDING,'SHAFT BOARDING'
UNION ALL SELECT GROUTING,'EROUTING'
UNION ALL SELECT SILICONE,'SILICONE'
UNION ALL SELECT SIGNAGE,'SIGNAGE'
UNION ALL SELECT MEP_FINAL_FIXTURES,'MEP FINAL FIXTURES'
UNION ALL SELECT ELECTRIC_METER_INSTALLATION,'ELECTRIC METER INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT FINAL_COAT_PAINT,'FINAL COAT PAINT'
)AS COLUMN_NAME(VALUE,TYPE_OF_WORK)
left JOIN STG.O_PLN_ELECTRICALROOM_MAP_STG EM
ON COLUMN_NAME.TYPE_OF_WORK = EM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
WHERE VALUE IS NOT NULL
) E
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] AS LM
     ON          E.[LEVEL] = LM.[LEVEL]
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM]P
      ON          E.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          E.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
WHERE          E.DRANK = 1',

query: 'SELECT 
          P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
           PROJECT_ID as PROJECT_IDENTIFIER,
          SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
          CAST(upload_time AS DATE) AS Upload_Date,
        [tower],
        [Type],
        [Villa Type] AS [Villa_Type],
        Category,
        [Drawing Number] AS [Drawing_Number],
        [Drawing Title] AS [Drawing_Title],
        NULLIF([Scheduled Date],'') AS 'Scheduled_Date',
        NULLIF([PNCA commitment],'') AS 'PNCA_commitment ',
        NULLIF(R0,'') AS R0,
        NULLIF([R0-Trans_Id],'') AS [R0_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R1,'') AS R1,
        NULLIF([R1-Trans_Id],'') AS [R1_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R2,'') AS R2,
        NULLIF([R2-Trans_Id],'') AS [R2_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R3,'') AS R3,
        NULLIF([R3-Trans_Id],'') AS [R3_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R4,'') AS R4,
        NULLIF([R4-Trans_Id],'') AS [R4_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R5,'') AS R5,
        NULLIF([R5-Trans_Id],'') AS [R5_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R6,'') AS R6,
        NULLIF([R6-Trans_Id],'') AS [R6_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R7,'') AS R7,
        NULLIF([R7-Trans_Id],'') AS [R7_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R8,'') AS R8,
        NULLIF([R8-Trans_Id],'') AS [R8_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R9,'') AS R9,
        NULLIF([R9-Trans_Id],'') AS [R9_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R10,'') AS R10,
        NULLIF([R10-Trans_Id],'') AS [R10_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R11,'') AS R11,
        NULLIF([R11-Trans_Id],'') AS [R11_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R12,'') AS R12,
        NULLIF([R12-Trans_Id],'') AS [R12_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R11,'') AS R13,
        NULLIF([R13-Trans_Id],'') AS [R13_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R12,'') AS R14,
        NULLIF([R14-Trans_Id],'') AS [R14_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R13,'') AS R15,
        NULLIF([R15-Trans_Id],'') AS [R15_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R16,'') AS R16,
        NULLIF([R16-Trans_Id],'') AS [R16_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R17,'') AS R17,
        NULLIF([R17-Trans_Id],'') AS [R17_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R18,'') AS R18,
        NULLIF([R18-Trans_Id],'') AS [R18_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R19,'') AS R19,
        NULLIF([R19-Trans_Id],'') AS [R19_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R20,'') AS R20,
        NULLIF([R20-Trans_Id],'') AS [R20_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R21,'') AS R21,
        NULLIF([R21-Trans_Id],'') AS [R21_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R22,'') AS R22,
        NULLIF([R22-Trans_Id],'') AS [R22_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R23,'') AS R23,
        NULLIF([R23-Trans_Id],'') AS [R23_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R24,'') AS R24,
        NULLIF([R24-Trans_Id],'') AS [R24_Trans_Id],
        NULLIF(R25,'') AS R25,
        NULLIF([R25-Trans_Id],'') AS [R25_Trans_Id]
FROM ( SELECT * , DENSE_RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY  project_id ORDER BY  CAST(upload_time AS DATE) DESC) Project_Udate_DRANK
        FROM STG.O_PLN_DRAWING_DETAIL_DRAW_STG
    WHERE ([Type] IS NOT NULL AND TRIM([Type]) NOT IN ('')) 
     ) AB 
     LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          AB.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
     LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          AB.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
',

query: '
SELECT 
    P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    F.TOWER,
    F.ACTIVITY_ID,
    F.Level,
    'Fire Lift Lobby' as Sclicer,
    CASE 
        WHEN F.VALUE IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE F.VALUE
    END AS VALUE,
    F.TYPE_OF_WORK,
    F.CATEGORY,
    F.UPLOAD_DATE
     from (
        SELECT CAST(FR.upload_time as DATE) AS Upload_Date,
        FR.project_id,
        FR.tower,
        FR.Level,
        Column_Name.*,
        FM.ACTIVITY_ID,
        FM.SBU_ID,
        FM.CATEGORY,
        DENSE_RANK () OVER     (PARTITION BY  project_id
                            ORDER BY  CAST(upload_time as DATE) DESC
                            )     DRANK
    FROM STG.O_PLN_FIRELIFTLOBBY_RAW_STG FR
    CROSS apply (
                        SELECT    MEP_Marking_for_Builders_Work    ,    'MEP Marking for Builders Work'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Cutting_and_Chasing_of_Blockwork    ,    'Cutting & Chasing of Blockwork'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    MEP_Services_Installation    ,    'MEP Services Installation'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Wall_MEP_Services_Packing    ,    'Wall MEP Services Packing'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Plaster    ,    'Plaster'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Screed    ,    'Screed'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Lift_Door_Installation_and_Jamb_Installation    ,    'Lift Door Installation & Jamb Installation'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Beside_Lift_Door_Blockwork    ,    'Beside Lift Door Blockwork'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Beside_Lift_Door_Plaster    ,    'Beside Lift Door Plaster'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    MEP_High_Level_Works    ,    'MEP High Level Works'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    FC_Framing    ,    'FC Framing'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    MEP_Boarding_Clearance    ,    'MEP Boarding Clearance'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    FC_Boarding    ,    'FC Boarding'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Joint_Taping_and_Sanding    ,    'Joint Taping and Sanding'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Ceiling_Primer    ,    'Ceiling Primer'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Ceiling_Stucco_1st_and_2nd_Coat    ,    'Ceiling Stucco 1st and 2nd Coat'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Ceiling_First_Coat_Paint    ,    'Ceiling First Coat Paint'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Wall_Primer    ,    'Wall Primer'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Wall_Stucco_1st_and_2nd_Coat    ,    'Wall Stucco 1st and 2nd Coat'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Wall_First_Coat_Paint    ,    'Wall First Coat Paint'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Floor_Tile    ,    'Floor Tile'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Door_Frame_Installation    ,    'Door-Frame Installation'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Door_Architrave_Installation    ,    'Door-Architrave Installation'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Door_Shutter_Installation    ,    'Door-Shutter Installation'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Door_Ironmongery_Installation    ,    'Door-Ironmongery Installation'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Door_Silicone    ,    'Door-Silicone'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Epoxy_Grinding    ,    'Epoxy Grinding'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Epoxy_Bug_Fill    ,    'Epoxy Bug Fill'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Epoxy_Primer    ,    'Epoxy Primer'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Epoxy_First_Coat    ,    'Epoxy First Coat'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Epoxy_Final_Coat    ,    'Epoxy Final Coat'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Skirting    ,    'Skirting'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Grout    ,    'Grout'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Silicone    ,    'Silicone'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Signage    ,    'Signage'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    MEP_Final_Fixtures    ,    'MEP Final Fixtures'
                        UNION ALL SELECT    Final_Coat    ,    'Final Coat'
                        )as Column_Name(value,Type_of_work)
    INNER JOIN STG.O_PLN_FIRELIFTLOBBY_MAP_STG FM
    ON Column_Name.Type_of_work = FM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
    WHERE VALUE IS NOT NULL
       ) F
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] AS LM
     ON          F.[LEVEL] = LM.[LEVEL]
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          F.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          F.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
WHERE          F.DRANK = 1
',

query: 'SELECT 
     P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    GAR.TOWER    ,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,
    GAR.[LEVEL]    ,
    'Garbage Room' as Sclicer,
      GAR.ACTIVITY_ID    ,
    CASE 
        WHEN GAR.VALUE IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE GAR.VALUE
    END AS VALUE,
    GAR.TYPE_OF_WORK    ,
    GAR.CATEGORY   ,
     GAR.UPLOAD_DATE  
   
FROM 

(
        SELECT CAST(GR.UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) AS UPLOAD_DATE,
        GR.PROJECT_ID,
        GR.TOWER,
        GR.LEVEL,
        COLUMN_NAME.*,
        GM.ACTIVITY_ID,
        GM.SBU_ID,
        GM.CATEGORY,
        DENSE_RANK () OVER     (PARTITION BY  PROJECT_ID
                            ORDER BY  CAST(UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) DESC
                            )     DRANK
    FROM STG.O_PLN_GARBAGEROOM_RAW_STG  GR
    CROSS APPLY  (
         SELECT    [OUTER_WALL_BLOCKWORK]     ,  'OUTER WALL BLOCKWORK'
UNION ALL SELECT   [GARBAGE_CHUTE_WORKS]     ,  'GARBAGE CHUTE WORKS'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_PIPING_WORKS]     ,  'MEP PIPING WORKS'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_PRESSURE_TEST_AND_CLEARANCE]     ,  'MEP PRESSURE TEST & CLEARANCE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [INNER_WALL_BLOCKWORK]     ,  'INNER WALL BLOCKWORK'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_MARKING_FOR_BUILDERS_WORK]     ,  'MEP MARKING FOR BUILDERS WORK'
UNION ALL SELECT   [CUTTING_AND_CHASING_OF_BLOCKWORK]     ,  'CUTTING & CHASING OF BLOCKWORK'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_SERVICES_INSTALLATION]     ,  'MEP SERVICES INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT   [WALL_MEP_SERVICES_PACKING]     ,  'WALL MEP SERVICES PACKING'

UNION ALL SELECT   [BORE_PACKING]     ,  'BORE PACKING'

UNION ALL SELECT   [SCREED]     ,  'SCREED'
UNION ALL SELECT   [WALL_TILE]     ,  'WALL TILE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_FRAMING_CLEARANCE]     ,  'MEP FRAMING CLEARANCE'

UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_BOARDING_CLEARANCE]     ,  'MEP BOARDING CLEARANCE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [FALSE_CEILING_BOARDING]     ,  'FALSE CEILING BOARDING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [CEILING_PRIMER]     ,  'CEILING PRIMER'
UNION ALL SELECT   [CEILING_STUCCO_1ST_AND_2ND_COAT]     ,  'CEILING STUCCO (1ST AND 2ND COAT)'
UNION ALL SELECT   [CEILING_FIRST_COAT_PAINT]     ,  'CEILING FIRST COAT PAINT'
UNION ALL SELECT   [UNDER_TILE_WATER_PROOFING]     ,  'UNDER TILE WATER PROOFING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [THRESHOLD]     ,  'THRESHOLD'
UNION ALL SELECT   [FLOOR_TILE]     ,  'FLOOR TILE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [SKIRTING]     ,  'SKIRTING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [GROUTING]     ,  'GROUTING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [SILICONE]     ,  'SILICONE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [HOPPER_DOOR]     ,  'HOPPER DOOR'
UNION ALL SELECT   [DOOR_FRAME_INSTALLATION]     ,  'DOOR-FRAME INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT   [DOOR_ARCHITRAVE_INSTALLATION]     ,  'DOOR-ARCHITRAVE INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT   [DOOR_SHUTTER_INSTALLATION]     ,  'DOOR-SHUTTER INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT   [DOOR_IRONMONGERY_INSTALLATION]     ,  'DOOR-IRONMONGERY INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT   [DOOR_SILICONE]     ,  'DOOR-SILICONE'

                        )AS COLUMN_NAME(VALUE,TYPE_OF_WORK)
    INNER JOIN STG.O_PLN_GARBAGEROOM_MAP_STG  GM
    ON COLUMN_NAME.TYPE_OF_WORK = GM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE

INNER JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] AS LM

LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P

query: 'select
        Upload_Date,
        P.Sort_ID AS Project_ID,
        SM.SBU_Map_ID AS Sbu_ID,
        LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS Level_ID,
        KO.Tower,
        P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,
        KO.Flat,
        KO.Level,
        KO.Type_of_work,
        KO.Category,
        KO.Activity_ID,
       Format(cast(NULLIF(KO.Value,'') AS DATE ),'dd-MM-yyy')AS Real_Value,
        CASE
            WHEN TRIM(KO.value) IN ('','-','0%','00%') THEN 0
            WHEN KO.value IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(KO.value) NOT IN ('','-','0%','00%') THEN 1
            ELSE 0
        END AS value,
        
        CASE 
            WHEN TRIM(KO.Category) IN('Paint') THEN  1
            WHEN TRIM(KO.Category) IN('Facade') THEN  2
            WHEN TRIM(KO.Category) IN('MEP') THEN  3
            WHEN TRIM(KO.Category) IN('PMT') THEN  4
            WHEN TRIM(KO.Category) IN('Consultant') THEN  5
            WHEN TRIM(KO.Category) IN('Client') THEN  6
            ELSE 20
        END AS Category_Sort
    FROM (
    SELECT
        cast(OPKOR.upload_time AS DATE) AS Upload_Date,
        OPKOR.project_id,
        OPKOR.tower,
        OPKOR.sbu_id ,
        OPKOR.Level,
        OPKOR.Flat,
        Column_Name.*,
        OPKOM.ACTIVITY_ID,
        OPKOM.SBU_ID AS SBU_Filter,
        OPKOM.Category,
        DENSE_RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY OPKOR.project_id ORDER BY CAST(OPKOR.upload_time AS DATE) DESC) AS DRanker
    FROM STG.O_PLN_KEEPOUT_RAW_STG OPKOR
    CROSS Apply (
                        SELECT Final_Coat_Paint_Dry_Area , 'Final Coat Paint - Dry Area'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Final_Coat_Paint_Wet_Area , 'Final Coat Paint - Wet Area'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Facade_Stamp , 'Facade Stamp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Bathroom_Stamp_MEP_L8 , 'Bathroom Stamp - MEP (L8)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Bathroom_Stamp_Civil_L9 , 'Bathroom Stamp - Civil (L9)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Kitchen_Stamp_MEP_I8 , 'Kitchen Stamp - MEP (I8)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Kitchen_Stamp_Civil_I9 , 'Kitchen Stamp - Civil (I9)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Dry_Area_Stamp_Civil_F7 , 'Dry Area Stamp - Civil (F7)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Dry_Area_Stamp_MEP_F8 , 'Dry Area Stamp - MEP (F8)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT MEP_NOC , 'MEP NOC'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Civil_NOC , 'Civil NOC'
                    UNION ALL SELECT MEP_Field_Report_1ST_Insp , 'MEP Field Report 1ST Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT MEP_Field_Report_2nd_Insp , 'MEP Field Report 2nd Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Facade_Field_Report_1st_Insp , 'Facade Field Report 1st Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Facade_Field_Report_2nd_Insp , 'Facade Field Report 2nd Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Civil_Field_Report_1st_Insp , 'Civil Field Report 1st Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Civil_Field_Report_2nd_Insp , 'Civil Field Report 2nd Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT SCL_Signoff , 'SCL Signoff'
                    UNION ALL SELECT PNCA_Signoff , 'PNCA Signoff'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Keep_Out_QT , 'Keep Out (QT)'
                        ) AS Column_Name(value,Type_of_work)
    JOIN STG.O_PLN_KEEPOUT_MAP_STG OPKOM
    ON Column_Name.Type_of_work = OPKOM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
        WHERE value IS NOT NULL) KO   
INNER JOIN    DWH.PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM LM 
    ON        KO.LEVEL = LM.LEVEL 
LEFT JOIN    [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
    ON        KO.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN    [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
    ON      KO.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
     WHERE       KO.DRANKER = 1
   

  ',

query: 'SELECT 
    Upload_Date AS Date,
    P.Sort_ID as project_id,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,
    tower AS Tower,
    Level,
    Flat_No,
    SM.[SBU_Map_ID] as SBU_ID,
    Apartment_Type,
    ACTIVITY_ID,
    ENGINEER_RESPONSIBLE AS Engineer_Responsible,
    Types_of_Activities AS Activity,
    delay_pln
       ,value_plan AS [Plan]
       ,Count_Pln,
    Predes_value_plan AS Predecessor_Plan,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(Predecessor_Activities) IN ('FROM CTE 1','FROM CTE 2') AND Count_Pln = 1 THEN value_plan 
        WHEN TRIM(Predecessor_Activities) IN ('FROM CTE 1','FROM CTE 2') AND Count_Pln != 1 THEN NULL
        ELSE Predes_value_plan
    END AS Predecessor_Plan_Work_Front,
    Predecessor_Activities AS Predecessor,
    delay_act,
    value_act AS Actual,
    Count_act,
    Predes_value_act AS [Predecessor_Actual],
    CASE
        WHEN TRIM(Predecessor_Activities) IN ('FROM CTE 1','FROM CTE 2') AND Count_Act = 1 THEN value_act
        WHEN TRIM(Predecessor_Activities) IN ('FROM CTE 1','FROM CTE 2') AND Count_Act != 1 THEN NULL
        ELSE Predes_value_act
    END AS [Predecessor_Actual_Work_Front],
    CASE WHEN Planned_SLA <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE Planned_SLA END AS SLA_Planned,
    CASE WHEN Actual_SLA <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE Actual_SLA END AS SLA_Actual,
    Given_SLA AS SLA,
     CASE 
            WHEN Actual_SLA <= 0 THEN     '<= 0'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 1 THEN     '= 1'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 2 THEN     '= 2'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 3 THEN     '= 3'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 4 THEN     '= 4'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 5 THEN     '= 5'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 6 THEN     '= 6'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 7 THEN     '= 7'
            WHEN Actual_SLA > 7 THEN     '> 7'
            ELSE NULL
        END AS Actual_SLA_Title
FROM [DWH].[PLN_VALIDATION_DATA_OUTPUT_FINAL_B_VIEW] PP
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          PP.Project_id=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
     LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          PP.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER

',

query: 'SELECT

    KA.TYPE_OF_WORK,

     KA.UPLOAD_DATE
FROM (
          SELECT 
               KR.UPLOAD_TIME AS UPLOAD_DATE,

               KR.TOWER,

               KM.ACTIVITY_ID,

           FROM [STG].[O_PLN_KITCHENAREA_RAW_STG] KR
           CROSS APPLY (
                          SELECT [KITCHEN_AREA_PLASTER] , 'KITCHEN AREA PLASTER'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_UTILITY_FRAMING] , 'KITCHEN / UTILITY FRAMING'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_UTILITY_BOARDING] , 'KITCHEN / UTILITY BOARDING'

                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_COUNTER_TOP] , 'KITCHEN COUNTER TOP'

                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_CABINET_GROUTING] , 'KITCHEN CABINET GROUTING'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_CABINET_SILICONE] , 'KITCHEN CABINET SILICONE'

                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_APPLIANCES] , 'KITCHEN APPLIANCES'

query: 'SELECT 
     UPLOAD_DATE,
    P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER,
     --PR.PROJECT_ID AS PROJECT_NAME,
    TOWER,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    SBU,
    CLASSIFICATION,
    DESCRIPTION,
    CATEGORY,
    CASE     WHEN ISDATE(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_PLAN)=0
               THEN CAST(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_ACTUAL AS DATE)
               ELSE CAST(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_PLAN AS DATE) 
     END          AS ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_PLAN
    ,CAST(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_ACTUAL AS DATE) AS ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_ACTUAL
    ,CASE     WHEN ISDATE(PR_PLAN)=0
               THEN CAST(PR_ACTUAL AS DATE)
               ELSE CAST(PR_PLAN AS DATE) 
     END AS PR_PLAN
    ,CAST(PR_ACTUAL  AS DATE) AS PR_ACTUAL
    ,CASE     WHEN ISDATE(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_PLAN) =0
               THEN CAST(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_ACTUAL AS DATE)
               ELSE CAST(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_PLAN AS DATE) 
      END AS VENDOR_FINALIZATION_PLAN
    ,CAST(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_ACTUAL  AS DATE) AS VENDOR_FINALIZATION_ACTUAL
    ,CASE     WHEN ISDATE(REQUIRED_AT_SITE_BY) =0
               THEN CAST(ACTUAL_DELIVERY_AT_SITE AS DATE)
               ELSE CAST(REQUIRED_AT_SITE_BY AS DATE) 
     END AS REQUIRED_AT_SITE_BY
    ,CAST(ACTUAL_DELIVERY_AT_SITE AS DATE) AS ACTUAL_DELIVERY_AT_SITE
FROM(
     SELECT
               CAST(UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) AS UPLOAD_DATE,
               PROJECT_ID,
               TOWER,
               SBU_ID,
               SBU,
               CLASSIFICATION,
               DESCRIPTION,
               CATEGORY,
               CASE 
                   WHEN          ISDATE(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_PLAN)= 1 
                                   Then          FORMAT(CAST(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_PLAN AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                                   ELSE     UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END     AS ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_PLAN,
               CASE 
                   WHEN          ISDATE(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_ACTUAL)= 1  
                            THEN FORMAT(CAST(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_ACTUAL AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                            ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                         END     AS ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_ACTUAL,
               CASE 
                   WHEN ISDATE(PR_PLAN)= 1  
                              THEN FORMAT(CAST(PR_PLAN AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                              ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END AS PR_PLAN,
               CASE 
                   WHEN ISDATE(PR_ACTUAL)= 1   
                              THEN FORMAT(CAST(PR_ACTUAL AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                              ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END AS PR_ACTUAL,
               CASE 
                   WHEN ISDATE(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_PLAN)= 1    
                              THEN FORMAT(CAST(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_PLAN AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                              ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END AS VENDOR_FINALIZATION_PLAN,
               CASE 
                   WHEN  ISDATE(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_ACTUAL)= 1 
                              THEN FORMAT(CAST(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_ACTUAL AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                              ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END AS VENDOR_FINALIZATION_ACTUAL,
               CASE 
                   WHEN ISDATE(REQUIRED_AT_SITE_BY)= 1  
                              THEN FORMAT(CAST(REQUIRED_AT_SITE_BY AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                              ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END AS REQUIRED_AT_SITE_BY,
               CASE 
                   WHEN ISDATE(ACTUAL_DELIVERY_AT_SITE)= 1 
                              THEN FORMAT(CAST(ACTUAL_DELIVERY_AT_SITE AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                              ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END AS ACTUAL_DELIVERY_AT_SITE,
               DENSE_RANK() OVER ( PARTITION BY PROJECT_ID ORDER BY CAST(UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) DESC) DRANK
 FROM     [STG].[O_PLN_PROCUREMENT_STG])PR
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON         PR.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM]
SM
     ON          PR.SBU=SM.SBU_Shorts
      where DRANK=1',

query: ' SELECT 

      ff. Upload_Date,
        Unionall.Project,
        ff.Tower,
        ff.ACTIVITY_ID,
        unionall.SBU_ID,
        unionall.Area,
        'Flatwise Progress' AS Progress_Type,
        unionall.CATEGORY,
        unionall.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
        unionall.Flats,
       unionall.Total_Floors,
        unionall.Scheduled_Activities,
           sum(case 
               when ff.value=0 then 1 else null
          End) as Yet_TO_Start,

           sum(CASE WHEN ff.value = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL
           END )AS Completed,

           sum(CASE WHEN value BETWEEN 0.01 AND 0.999 THEN 1 ELSE NULL 
           END) AS In_Progress,

            AVG(ff.value) AS Average_Achived,
         SUM(ff.value) AS SUM_Achived,
         COUNT(ff.value) AS Count_Achived,
           2 as SORT_MAIN, 
       ABS((ISNULL( unionall.Scheduled_Activities,0)-(ISNULL(sum(CASE WHEN ff.value = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL
           END ),0)+ISNULL(sum(CASE WHEN value BETWEEN 0.01 AND 0.999 THEN 1 ELSE NULL 
           END) ,0)))) AS Yet_To_Start_Manual
           
           FROM(SELECT 
            Flat_count.Project_Identifier AS Project,
            a.ACTIVITY_ID,
            a.SBU_ID,
            a.Area,
            a.CATEGORY,
            a.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
            Flat_count.Flats,
            Flat_count.Total_Floors,
            Flat_count.Scheduled_Activities
        FROM (
          SELECT *, 'Dry Area' AS Area FROM STG.O_PLN_DRYAREA_MAP_STG
        UNION ALL
        SELECT *, 'Wet Area' AS Area FROM STG.O_PLN_WETAREA_MAP_STG
        UNION ALL
        SELECT *, 'Kitchen Area' AS Area FROM STG.O_PLN_KITCHENAREA_MAP_STG
        UNION ALL
        SELECT *, 'Balcony Area' AS Area FROM STG.O_PLN_BALCONYAREA_MAP_STG) a
          CROSS Apply (SELECT 
                                           Project_Identifier,
                                           FLAT_COUNT AS Scheduled_Activities,
                                           FLAT_COUNT AS Flats,
                                           Total_Floors AS Total_Floors
                                       FROM [STG].[PROJECTS_NEW_STG]
                                                WHERE Project_Identifier !='Creek Vista Grande') AS Flat_count) Unionall

                                                Join DWH.PLN_FLATFINISHES_FACT ff 
                                                on unionall.Activity_Id=ff.Activity_ID
                                      group by   ff. Upload_Date,
       Unionall.Project,
        ff.Tower,
        ff.ACTIVITY_ID,
        unionall.SBU_ID,
        unionall.Area,
        unionall.CATEGORY,
        unionall.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
        unionall.Flats,
       unionall.Total_Floors,
        unionall.Scheduled_Activities
          
          --ff.Yet_To_Start_Manual,

     UNION aLL

     SELECT 
        ff. Update_Date,
      Unionall.Project,
        ff.Tower,
        ff.ACTIVITY_ID,
        unionall.SBU_ID,
        unionall.Area,
       'Service Room Progress' AS Progress_Type,
        unionall.CATEGORY,
        unionall.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
        unionall.Flats,
       unionall.Total_Floors,
        unionall.Scheduled_Activities,
           sum(case 
               when ff.value=0 then 1 else null
          End) as Yet_TO_Start,

           sum(CASE WHEN ff.value = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL
           END )AS Completed,

           sum(CASE WHEN value BETWEEN 0.01 AND 0.999 THEN 1 ELSE NULL 
           END) AS In_Progress,

            AVG(ff.value) AS Average_Achived,
         SUM(ff.value) AS SUM_Achived,
         COUNT(ff.value) AS Count_Achived,
           4 as SORT_MAIN ,
         ABS((ISNULL( unionall.Scheduled_Activities,0)-(ISNULL(sum(CASE WHEN ff.value = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL
           END ),0)+ISNULL(sum(CASE WHEN value BETWEEN 0.01 AND 0.999 THEN 1 ELSE NULL 
           END) ,0)))) AS Yet_To_Start_Manual
           FROM (
     SELECT 
            Flat_count.Project_Identifier AS Project,
               a.ACTIVITY_ID,
            a.SBU_ID,
            a.Area,
            a.CATEGORY,
            a.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
            Flat_count.*
           FROM 
             (SELECT *, 'Water Room' AS Area FROM [STG].[O_PLN_WATERROOM_MAP_STG]
    UNION ALL
    SELECT *, 'Electrical Room' AS Area FROM [STG].[O_PLN_ELECTRICALROOM_MAP_STG]
    UNION ALL
    SELECT *, 'Telephone Room' AS Area FROM [STG].[O_PLN_TELEPHONEROOM_MAP_STG]
    UNION ALL
    SELECT *, 'Fire-Lift Lobby' AS Area FROM [STG].[O_PLN_FIRELIFTLOBBY_MAP_STG]
    UNION ALL
    SELECT *, 'Garbage Room' AS Area FROM [STG].[O_PLN_GARBAGEROOM_MAP_STG])a
CROSS JOIN (SELECT 
                                           Project_Identifier,
                                           Total_Floors AS Scheduled_Activities, 
                                           FLAT_COUNT AS Flats,
                                           Total_Floors AS Total_Floors
                                       FROM [STG].[PROJECTS_NEW_STG]) AS Flat_count) Unionall

                                                 Join [DWH].[PLN_SERVICEROOMS_FACT] ff 
                                                on unionall.Activity_Id=ff.Activity_ID 
                                                 group by   ff. Update_Date,
        Unionall.Project,
        ff.Tower,
        ff.ACTIVITY_ID,
        unionall.SBU_ID,
        unionall.Area,
        unionall.CATEGORY,
        unionall.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
        unionall.Flats,
       unionall.Total_Floors,
        unionall.Scheduled_Activities
          --Yet_To_Start_Manual
     UNION ALL

     
SELECT 
        sf.Upload_Date,
        a.Project,
       'Overall' AS Tower,
        a.ACTIVITY_ID,
       'SBU 3' AS SBU_ID,
       'Slab' AS Area,
       'Structure Progress' AS Progress_Type,
        a.CATEGORY,
          ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE,
        COUNT(sf.Level) AS Completed,
        NULL AS In_Progress,
        NULL AS Yet_To_Start,
        a.Flats,
        a.Total_Floors,
        a.Scheduled_Activities,
          NULL AS Average_Achived,
        COUNT(Level) AS SUM_Achived,
         COUNT(Level) AS Count_Achived,
           1  as SORT_MAIN ,
       ABS((ISNULL(A.Scheduled_Activities,0)-(ISNULL( COUNT(sf.Level),0)+ISNULL( NULL,0)))) AS Yet_To_Start_Manual
    FROM (

       ISNULL(Sum(Try_CAST(CASE WHEN PTF.value BETWEEN 0.01 AND 0.999 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END as Decimal(15,4))),0)))) AS Yet_To_Start_Manual
          from
   (

query: '    SELECT 
     P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
     SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    S.TOWER,
    S.LEVEL,
        S.STAIR_CASE_NO,
        'Staircase Area' AS sclicer,
     S.ACTIVITY_ID,
    CASE 
        WHEN S.VALUE IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE S.VALUE
    END AS VALUE,
    S.TYPE_OF_WORK,
    S.CATEGORY,
     S.UPLOAD_DATE,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(S.CATEGORY) IN('MEP') THEN  8
        WHEN TRIM(S.CATEGORY) IN('BUILDERS WORK') THEN  2
        WHEN TRIM(S.CATEGORY) IN('PLASTER') THEN  3
        WHEN TRIM(S.CATEGORY) IN('PAINT') THEN  9
        WHEN TRIM(S.CATEGORY) IN('HANDRAIL') THEN  4
        WHEN TRIM(S.CATEGORY) IN('MARBLE') THEN  5
        WHEN TRIM(S.CATEGORY) IN('JOINERY') THEN  6
        WHEN TRIM(S.CATEGORY) IN('SIGNAGE') THEN  7
        WHEN TRIM(S.CATEGORY) IN('PMT') THEN  1
        ELSE 10
    END AS CATEGORY_SORT
FROM
(
     SELECT
        CAST(OPSR.UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) AS UPLOAD_DATE, 
        OPSR.PROJECT_ID,
        OPSR.TOWER,
        OPSR.LEVEL,
        OPSR.STAIR_CASE_NO,
        COLUMN_NAME.*,
        OPSM.ACTIVITY_ID,
        OPSM.SBU_ID,
        OPSM.CATEGORY,
        DENSE_RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY  OPSR.PROJECT_ID ORDER BY  CAST(OPSR.UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) DESC) DRANK
  FROM STG.O_PLN_STAIRCASE_RAW_STG OPSR
    CROSS APPLY (
                SELECT     MEP_CONDUIT_MARKING     ,     'MEP CONDUIT MARKING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     CUTTING_AND_CHASING     ,     'CUTTING AND CHASING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     MEP_CONDUIT_FIXTURES     ,     'MEP CONDUIT FIXTURES'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     WALL_PACKING     ,     'WALL PACKING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     PLASTER     ,     'PLASTER'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     GRINDING     ,     'GRINDING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     POP     ,     'POP'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     MEDIUM_COAT_CEILING_SPRAY_PLASTER     ,     'MEDIUM COAT CEILING SPRAY PLASTER'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     TWO_COAT_FINE_CEILING_SPRAY_PLASTER     ,     'TWO COAT FINE CEILING SPRAY PLASTER'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     CEILING_PRIMER     ,     'CEILING PRIMER'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     CEILING_TEXTURE     ,     'CEILING TEXTURE'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     WALL_PRIMER     ,     'WALL PRIMER'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     WALL_STUCCO_BANDING     ,     'WALL STUCCO BANDING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     [WALL_STUCCO_(1ST_AND_2ND_COAT)]     ,     'WALL STUCCO (1ST AND 2ND COAT)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     MEP_CLEARANCE_FOR_PRESSURIZATION_SHAFT     ,     'MEP CLEARANCE FOR PRESSURIZATION SHAFT'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     SANDING     ,     'SANDING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     WALL_FIRST_COAT_PAINT     ,     'WALL FIRST COAT PAINT'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     CEILING_FIRST_COAT_PAINT     ,     'CEILING FIRST COAT PAINT'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     HANDRAIL_FLOOR_MOUNTED     ,     'HANDRAIL FLOOR MOUNTED'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     HANDRAIL_WALL_MOUNTED     ,     'HANDRAIL WALL MOUNTED'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     EPOXY_GRINDING     ,     'EPOXY GRINDING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     EPOXY_BUG_FILL     ,     'EPOXY BUG FILL'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     EPOXY_PRIMER     ,     'EPOXY PRIMER'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     EPOXY_BASE_COAT     ,     'EPOXY BASE COAT'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     EPOXY_FINAL_COAT     ,     'EPOXY FINAL COAT'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     THRESHOLD_INSTALLATION     ,     'THRESHOLD INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     DOOR_FRAME_INSTALLATION     ,     'DOOR - FRAME INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     DOOR_ARCHITRAVE_INSTALLATION     ,     'DOOR - ARCHITRAVE INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     DOOR_SHUTTER_INSTALLATION     ,     'DOOR - SHUTTER INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     DOOR_IRONMONGERY_INSTALLATION     ,     'DOOR - IRONMONGERY INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     DOOR_SILICONE_WORKS     ,     'DOOR - SILICONE WORKS'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     SIGNAGE     ,     'SIGNAGE'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     NOSING_INSTALLATION     ,     'NOSING INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     HANDRAIL_PAINTING     ,     'HANDRAIL PAINTING'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     PREPARATION_FOR_FINAL_COAT_PAINT     ,     'PREPARATION FOR FINAL COAT PAINT'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     MEP_FINAL_FIXTURES_INSTALLATION     ,     'MEP FINAL FIXTURES INSTALLATION'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     FINAL_COAT_PAINT     ,     'FINAL COAT PAINT'
                    UNION ALL SELECT     STAIRCASE_PRESSURIZATION     ,     'STAIRCASE PRESSURIZATION'
        )
        AS COLUMN_NAME(VALUE,TYPE_OF_WORK)
    INNER JOIN 
     STG.O_PLN_STAIRCASE_MAP_STG OPSM
    ON COLUMN_NAME.TYPE_OF_WORK = OPSM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
    WHERE COLUMN_NAME.VALUE IS NOT NULL AND (TRIM(OPSR.LEVEL) NOT IN ('') AND OPSR.LEVEL IS NOT NULL)
        ) S
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] AS LM
     ON          S.[LEVEL] = LM.[LEVEL]
LEFT JOIN  [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          S.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          S.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
WHERE          S.DRANK = 1
',

query: 'SELECT
       KA.UPLOAD_DATE,
      P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_Id,
       KA.AREA,
      KA. Project_Id as Project_Identifier,
       
       LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
       SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
       KA.LEVEL,
       KA.POUR_COUNT,
       KA.POUR,
       KA.SEQUENCE_OF_APPEARANCE,
       KA.VALUE,
       LAG(KA.VALUE) OVER(PARTITION BY KA.PROJECT_ID,KA.POUR ORDER BY KA.POUR,VALUE) AS NEXT_DATE,
       DATEDIFF(YEAR,KA.VALUE,LAG(KA.VALUE) OVER(PARTITION BY KA.PROJECT_ID,KA.POUR ORDER BY KA.POUR,KA.VALUE)) AS AVG_DAYS,
       CASE 
           WHEN KA.AREA = 'TOWER' THEN     1
           WHEN KA.AREA = 'PODIUM' THEN     2
           WHEN KA.AREA = 'PODIUM-TA' THEN 3
           WHEN KA.AREA = 'TOWER A' THEN     4
           WHEN KA.AREA = 'PODIUM-TB' THEN 5
           WHEN KA.AREA = 'TOWER B' THEN     6
           WHEN KA.AREA = 'TOWER C' THEN     7
           WHEN KA.AREA = 'TOWER D' THEN     8
       ELSE NULL
       END AS VIEW_MAP,
       CASE 
           WHEN KA.VALUE < GETDATE() THEN 1
           ELSE 0
       END AS VALUE_AVERAGE
FROM(
        SELECT
            SP.UPLOAD_TIME AS UPLOAD_DATE,
            SP.PROJECT_ID,
            SP.LEVEL,
            SP.SBU_ID,
            OPSPM.POUR_COUNT, 
            OPSPM.SEQUENCE_OF_APPEARANCE, 
            OPSPM.AREA, 
            COLUMN_NAME.*,
            DENSE_RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY SP.PROJECT_ID ORDER BY UPLOAD_TIME  DESC) AS DRANK 
        FROM STG.O_PLN_STRUCTURE_POURING_STG SP
        CROSS APPLY (
                    SELECT Core_Wall_1 , 'Core Wall 1'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Core_Wall_2 , 'Core Wall 2'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Core_Wall_3 , 'Core Wall 3'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Core_Wall_4 , 'Core Wall 4'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Core_Wall_5 , 'Core Wall 5'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Core_Wall_6 , 'Core Wall 6'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Core_Wall_7 , 'Core Wall 7'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Core_Wall_8 , 'Core Wall 8'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Core_Wall_9 , 'Core Wall 9'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Core_Wall_10 , 'Core Wall 10'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Core_Wall_11 , 'Core Wall 11'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Core_Wall_12 , 'Core Wall 12'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Core_Wall_13 , 'Core Wall 13'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Core_Wall_14 , 'Core Wall 14'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Core_Wall_15 , 'Core Wall 15'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Core_Wall_16 , 'Core Wall 16'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Core_Wall_17 , 'Core Wall 17'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Core_Wall_18 , 'Core Wall 18'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Core_Wall_19 , 'Core Wall 19'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Core_Wall_20 , 'Core Wall 20'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Slab_1 , 'Slab 1'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Slab_2 , 'Slab 2'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Slab_3 , 'Slab 3'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Slab_4 , 'Slab 4'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Slab_5 , 'Slab 5'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Slab_6 , 'Slab 6'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Slab_7 , 'Slab 7'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Slab_8 , 'Slab 8'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Slab_9 , 'Slab 9'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Slab_10 , 'Slab 10'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Slab_11 , 'Slab 11'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Slab_12 , 'Slab 12'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Slab_13 , 'Slab 13'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Slab_14 , 'Slab 14'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Slab_15 , 'Slab 15'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Slab_16 , 'Slab 16'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Slab_17 , 'Slab 17'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Slab_18 , 'Slab 18'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Slab_19 , 'Slab 19'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Slab_20 , 'Slab 20'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Staircase_1 , 'Staircase 1'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Staircase_2 , 'Staircase 2'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Staircase_3 , 'Staircase 3'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Staircase_4 , 'Staircase 4'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Staircase_5 , 'Staircase 5'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Staircase_6 , 'Staircase 6'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Staircase_7 , 'Staircase 7'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Staircase_8 , 'Staircase 8'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Staircase_9 , 'Staircase 9'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Staircase_10 , 'Staircase 10'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Staircase_11 , 'Staircase 11'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Staircase_13 , 'Staircase 13'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Staircase_14 , 'Staircase 14'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Staircase_15 , 'Staircase 15'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Staircase_16 , 'Staircase 16'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Staircase_17 , 'Staircase 17'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Staircase_18 , 'Staircase 18'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Staircase_19 , 'Staircase 19'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Staircase_20 , 'Staircase 20'
                   )AS COLUMN_NAME(VALUE,POUR) 
         INNER JOIN   
      STG.O_PLN_STRUCTURES_POUR_MAP_STG  OPSPM 
             ON        COLUMN_NAME.POUR = OPSPM.TYPE_OF_POUR 
         WHERE        VALUE IS NOT NULL AND Lower(COLUMN_NAME.POUR)  like 'slab%'  AND SP.LEVEL NOT LIKE 'grade%' AND TRIM(COLUMN_NAME.VALUE) NOT IN ('')) KA 
left JOIN    DWH.PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM LM 
    ON        KA.LEVEL = LM.LEVEL 
left JOIN    [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
   ON        KA.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_Identifier
LEFT JOIN    [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
    ON      KA.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
WHERE       KA.DRANK = 1',

query: 'select 
        GAR.Id_,
          GAR.upload_time,  
          GAR.tower, 
          p.Sort_ID as project_id,
          sm.Sbu_Map_Id as sbu_id,
          RTRIM(GAR.SBU) as SBU,
          RTRIM(GAR.Project) as Project, 
          RTRIM(GAR.type) as type,
          GAR.Sub_Contractor,
          GAR.Activity,
          GAR.SCL_Engineer,
          GAR.Shift, 
          GAR.Count,
          GAR. Trade
from(
select
          s.Id_,
          s.upload_time,  
          s.tower, 
          RTRIM(s.SBU) as SBU,
          RTRIM(s.Project) as Project, 
          RTRIM(s.type) as type,
          s.Sub_Contractor,
          s.Activity,
          s.SCL_Engineer,
          column_name.Trade_uncleaned as Trade,
          case when column_name.Trade_uncleaned like '%D' then 'Day'
                when column_name.Trade_uncleaned like '%N' then 'Night'
                when column_name.Trade_uncleaned like '%D/N' then 'Day_Night'
                else 'Error'
                end as Shift, 
          column_name.Count

                         where

                         ,'HVAC','Plumber','Electrician','Steel Fixer','Marble / Stone Mason','Screed Mason','Joinery Carpenter','Gypsum Carpenter','Tile Mason',
